newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Bank of Portugal injects 5 bln esc, 6.5 pct.
newsitem.headline: Bank of Portugal injects 5 bln esc, 6.5 pct.

text.p: The Bank of Portugal said it injected five billion escudos of eight-day funds into the money market at a weighted average rate of 6.5 percent in a variable rate repurchase tender.
The rate compared with 6.5 percent previously.
